scripts.dev: clear && next telemetry disable && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 next dev
scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && next telemetry disable && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 next build
scripts.start: tsc --noEmit && next telemetry disable && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 next start
scripts.lint: next telemetry disable && NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 next lint
